mapper.select: SELECT b.id id ,u.user_name name ,b.blog_title blogTitle ,b.logo_file logoFile FROM blog b, users u WHERE b.id = #{id} AND b.id = u.id

SELECT b.id ,u.user_name name ,b.blog_title blogTitle ,b.logo_file logoFile ,NVL(ref.regDate, '01/01/01') regDate FROM users u, blog b, (SELECT id, max(regDate) regDate FROM (SELECT c.id id, TO_CHAR(p.reg_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') regDate FROM category c, post p WHERE c.cate_no = p.cate_no(+)) GROUP BY id) ref WHERE b.id = ref.id AND b.id = u.id AND b.blog_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY regDate DESC ,u.user_no DESC

SELECT b.id ,u.user_name name ,b.blog_title blogTitle ,b.logo_file logoFile ,NVL(ref.regDate, '01/01/01') regDate FROM users u, blog b, (SELECT id, max(regDate) regDate FROM (SELECT c.id id, TO_CHAR(p.reg_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') regDate FROM category c, post p WHERE c.cate_no = p.cate_no(+)) GROUP BY id) ref WHERE b.id = ref.id AND b.id = u.id AND u.user_name LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY regDate DESC ,u.user_no DESC
